reviews.review: Ruined the game with all the new killers, survivor with friends is not fun anymore with getting wiped at the lowest survivor ranks. If you want to play a solo stab stab people game without any effort, this is your game.

Мне очень понравилась эта хоррор игра!
Играю в неё с 2019 года.Узнала об этой игре от стримера Дмитрия Бэйла.
Игра растет и меняется в лучшую сторону!
快乐游戏or脑溢血游戏，反正不是恐怖游戏

Fun game both on killer and survivor, my biggest complaint currently is the weird new ranking system I don't quite agree with, I think the old system was slightly better. I do like you don't de-rank, but unfair on the rankings when they reset.

Desde el primer día que llevo jugando me gusto mucho este juego, tiene sus momentos de tensión y risas xdd lo recomiendo al 100% y espero que sigan trayendo más contenido nuevo, me gustaría ver a Chucky como killer y a Jason xd

Как же хочется Бубочку!
Толстенького, бледного, очень высокого
Непременно грозного, не ослепленного 
С огромными руками, синяками под глазами 
И тёмными волосами

отличный способ убедиться в том, что ты лучший человек во вселенной
открываешь комменты в профиле
берёшь нюрсу
тратишь пару десятков часов в приватках на задрачивание скилла
заходишь в паблик
тратишь пару десятков часов на фарм первого ранга
тратишь всё свободное время на эту поебень
перед сном открываешь профиль
довольствуешься нытьём малолетних ракалов, которые за 1к+ часов не научились играть и падают с двух блинков, параллельно обвиняя тебя во всех смертных грехах
ложишься спать с чувством абсолютного превосходства над другими

Amazing game, deep complexity, skill means a lot

A bit of a learning curve, and you definitely need to be the type to enjoy competition but also not get frustrated. Everyone I know says this game is a love-hate relationship and I have to agree, but after approximately 1.5k hours across all platforms I can't seem to stop playing.

The game is very fun.  I prefer to be a killer, i feel great joy in making my victims heart race in terro.  Even if i dont serve them up to the blood god, This time.    mew wa ha ha ha ha  there is always a next time to enjoy the musk of fear from my prey.
开黑不错.挺不错的游戏.如果不是up或者主播建议和小伙伴们一起玩
New rank No Fair and balance
worth it for the hot killers
I wish i was Dead by Daylight :)
只要多多送血点  啥都好说
Não recomendo. Jogo cheio de bug, só pega time bosta! Parece early access.

Schritt 1: Gehe durch dein Dorf oder deine Stadt und suche dir 3 Dorf- oder Stadt-Trottel indem du laut rumschreist ob jemand Dead By Daylight spielen möchte. Achte besonders darauf, dass die Personen ängstlich oder psychisch labil wirken um das Spielerlebnis zu steigern.

Schritt 2: Verzichtet auf Discord und geht auf einen Teamspeak und startet eine Runde.

Schritt 3: Du gehst so weit weg wie möglich vom Rest, reparierst deine Generatoren und erfreust dich im Hintergrund über panische Schreie deiner Teammates wenn der Killer auftaucht.

Schritt 4: Schritt 3 wiederholen.
hit em wit da lef hook ya know what i mean
I like this game, but it makes me like myself less. Kat Best.

4.2k hours, been playing for years. 1k hour as killer and 3k as survivor. Killer was already wildly easy(hence I played it less), but now it's brain dead spoon fed killers. It's ridiculously boring to play killer unless you have some kind of weird power fetish(like using cheats in GTA) and you have to be a MASOCHIST to play survivor. Uninstalled, literally can't play this game anymore. That should mean A LOT from someone with 4.2k hours. If you think playing survivor may be cool, DO NOT BUY THIS GAME. If you were bullied in highschool and want a game with literally defenseless punching bags, you'll probably enjoy killer. DO NOT BUY THIS GAME OR DLC's. They HATE their vets.
this game is pure luck which makes it 50/50 so youre always on your toes
Game is over hyped. It isnt really balanced. The hitbox is terrible.  I find friday the 13th game lot better than this.

Este é um jogo podre. Quando não há problemas de desempenho, existe um jogador de bubba completamente infeliz e solitário que deseja descontar todas as suas frustrações e a sua insignificância nos jogadores do jogo. Eu recomendo que vocês procurem jogos que vão acrescentar a vida de vocês porque isso aqui é a própria caçamba de lixo.
highly recommended if u like horror games. Best one out there

O jogo já foi bom, infelizmente não evoluiu quase nada desde o alfa dessa porra q eu joguei e atualmente está passando por uma fase de extrema crise com hit boxes bugada e pouca inovação no gamestyle.

I love the way you can play survivor or killer. Its fun to switch the roles and be able to increase your skills with the bloodpoints. I don't like sometimes where the killers can overpower you with their skills but its fun still less.
